units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Install using ignition file on USB Key
After=multi-user.target
[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStartPre=mount /dev/sdb1 /srv
ExecStart=/usr/bin/coreos-installer install /dev/sda -i /srv/ignition.json
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: installation.service
